body: This massive +1 ghost touch disrupting warhammer is crafted from a single piece of metal. It surface has no blemishes or distinguishing marks, and its haft is wrapped in dry, leathery, ancient skin. Three times per day as a free action, when used to strike an undead creature, that creature must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or be knocked prone.
name: Ghoul's Lament
